title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at the Deshaun Watson sweepstakes as teams are lining up to trade for the 3x Pro Bowl QB and why we shouldn't be surprised this one specific team is getting involved. He believes the Packers despite returning Aaron Rodgers and other star players are no longer improving to keep up with the other Super Bowl contenders across the league. He also has some very bad news for one of the most premier sports franchises in America that has fallen on hard times. Plus, NFL insider Peter Schrager joins the show to tell Colin which team we should keep an eye on regarding Watson. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
